about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for 'Feast Your Eyes: Little Marshmallow'. Once purchased, the soundtrack will be located within the main game's installation folder (that you may easily locate by right clicking the game in your Steam Library, choosing 'Properties', going to the 'Local Files' tab, and then selecting 'Browse Local Files'. It'll be among the game's files, in a folder labelled 'Official Soundtrack & Art Collection').

The soundtrack comes in 320kbps .MP3 format, all properly labelled for easy organization. There is around 80 minutes worth of music between 45 songs, including extensions of songs found in the main game.

The art includes in-game art, concept sketches, WIPs before the final art, & other little goodies of the development process.

The Art and Soundtrack will be updated every time a new Act is released.

Spoilers below;

Act 1 Tracklist:
01. A Need For Title (0:48)
02. Gymnopedie (Feast Your Eyes Version) (1:59)
03. evaW (0:59)
04. Reception (0:57)
05. Noiseless Signal (1:07)
06. Host's House (2:10)
07. Backstage (1:06)
08. Terror Keeps On Marching (1:53)
09. A Place to Rest (1:15)
10. Screamarooni Scoopatoodie (0:44)
11. Waters Reflection (1:26)
12. Her Melody (2:19)
13. Strange Sheet (1:23)
14. Held Accountable (1:01)
15. Downfall (1:13)
16. A Story I Know, But Not My Own (2:18)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Sound Card: You need an audible device.
  • Additional Notes: You'll find the soundtrack in the folder where the game is installed.
